properties.name: opened
properties.description: If this property is true, dialog will be opened

properties.name: borderColor
properties.description: border color of the Confirm Dialog

properties.name: clickOutsideToCloase
properties.description: If this property is false, it is impossible to close the modal by clicking outside, default is true

properties.name: buttonsWidth
properties.description: Passing this props into bottom's buttons of confirmation modal component set up the width of buttons

properties.name: acceptButtonColor
properties.description: Can contain color value that in case of exists this property will be passed to accept button

properties.name: overflowCheck
properties.description: Check overflow depend on it option

properties.name: modalHeight
properties.description: Height of modal that wrap the whole component

properties.name: modalWidth
properties.description: Width of modal that wrap the whole component

properties.name: base
properties.description: Turn off stretch of modal on mobile resolutions

events.name: update:opened
events.description: Emitted when the dialog is opened and closed with opened status

events.name: accept
events.description: Emitted when user click the accept or close button with accepted status, If user click accpet, event is emitted with 'true' status. If user click the cancel button, event is emitted with 'false' status
